summary: A collection of generic helper functions used across the Airbrakes codebase, providing type conversion (including unknown types to float and string to float), time unit conversion, deadband filtering, command‑line argument parsing, queue extraction utilities, and process priority management with Windows multiprocessing support.
business_intent: Enable consistent data handling, command‑line interface configuration, inter‑process communication, and system resource management throughout the application by centralizing reusable utility logic.
